title: 1936 Benny Goodman Poster Font
content:
I have a client who wants a poster done just like it for a movie, but with different names, and he wants THAT font. Help! If I have to hand draw all this lettering it will be the death of me, but nothing close is making him happy, he wants this, exactly. Does it exist; this lettering is so uniform, I don't believe it was hand drawn; perhaps it's a modern replica done with type\> I'm crossing my fingers someone has seen these two fonts somewhere. He even want the type above Benny's Name, as well: "The Kind Of Swing..." that, also, is a mystery to me.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140613121929im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Benny_5912.jpg)
author: kayle

comments.content:
Cupola Regular by Masato Shimojima (Design Studio Creation / C-Font) 1998  
 [http://cfont.jp/font/cupola.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20140613121929/http:/cfont.jp/font/cupola.html "http://cfont.jp/font/cupola.html")
I figured out the King of Swing...it's Holly Script by URW. Now I'm just hunting down the Benny Goodman type; help if you can, please! Thanks!
Someone on myfonts identified this for me, should anyone be interested: it's cupoloa regular by Masato Shimojima. Over and out on this one...
